name: CyberBrick
description:
CyberBrick brings the classic brick breaking action games of the 1980s and 1990s into the modern era with plenty of frantic fun, wild chaos, and plain ol' good times to the max!

* Points are scored more by catching gems that fall from the broken bricks than simply breaking the bricks from afar.

* Bricks sporadically drop both positive and negative power-ups and de-buffs and it's up to you to learn what drops do what.

* Excellent play earns you extra balls that multiply your score exponentially!

* Rewarding gameplay ensures a high replay value that will likely have you playing again and again!

* More features, gameplay modes, levels, and game mechanics will be released over time as more and more players play the game.
